name: Name *
explanation_master_password: This password is very important, it will be used to encrypt all the passwords you will store in this vault. Please be sure to keep in mind this password. If you lose it, it will be impossible for us to retrieve your passwords in this vault.
error_name_empty: The name must not be empty
error_small_password: The password must be at least 6 characters
error_empty_password: The password must not be empty
error_username_empty: The username must not be empty
error_category_empty: The category must not be empty
error_text_empty: The text must be not empty
warning_message_delete_entry: Are you sure to delete the password {} ?
warning_message_delete_entry_definitely:
Are you sure to delete definitely the {} password ?
No restore will be possible.
warning_message_delete_category:
Are you sure to delete definitely the {} category ?
All the passwords in this category are going to be moved to the trash category.
warning_message_delete_tag: Are you sure to delete the {} tag ?
warning_message_delete_multiple_entry: Are you sure to delete these passwords ?
warning_message_delete_multiple_entry_de:
Are you sure to delete definitely these passwords ?
No restore will be possible.
error_server: An error occured while connecting to the server
error_code: The code must not be empty
message_will_lock_vault: Are you willing to go back to the list of vaults?
authenticate_to_unlock: Please authenticate to unlock your vault
desktop_no_payment: Can't change the subscription on Desktop, it can only be done from an android or an iOS.
login_code_message: A login code had been sent to your email.
error_user_dont_exist: This email isn't linked to any Chic Secret user.
error_user_cant_be_you: The email must be different to the one linked to your account.
cant_delete_vault_not_owner: Only the owner of this vault can delete it.
warning_message_delete_vault:
Are you sure to delete definitely the {} vault ?
All the passwords, categories, tags in this vault are going to be definitively deleted.
